app.title: Prephouse
about.title: About
common.permission.decline: Prephouse either cannot read these devices or does not have the required permissions by your browser to access them.

dashboard.title: My Progress
practice.feedback.title: Review feedback
practice.introduction.title: Get started
practice.instructions.title: Review instructions
practice.practice.title: Practice!
practice.settings.title: Select your preferences
practice.settings.liveFeedback.descripti: You will receive some, but not all, automated feedback from our system as you go. You can use that feedback to improve your skills along the way!
practice.settings.liveFeedback.helper: Choose whether to receive some feedback as you go
practice.settings.liveFeedback.title: Live Feedback
practice.settings.medium.helper: Choose whether to record/upload both audio and video, or audio only
practice.settings.medium.title: Medium
practice.settings.medium.videoAudio.desc: You will be required to show your face throughout the {sessionTypeName} and use your voice to conduct the {sessionTypeName}. You will receive the full set of feedback after the {sessionTypeName} has been completed.
practice.settings.source.helper: Choose whether to record a new {sessionTypeName} on our website or upload an existing (pre-recorded) {sessionTypeName}
practice.settings.source.record.descript: You will be required to use your webcam and microphone through your browser in order to record a new {sessionTypeName} on our website. You will receive instructions on how to perform the recording before you start.
practice.settings.source.title: Source
practice.settings.type.interview.descrip: An interview consists of an introduction from you and multiple questions asked by our system and to be answered by you.
practice.settings.type.helper: Choose between an interview or presentation for this session
practice.settings.type.title: Type
practice.title: Practice
practice.upload: Upload an existing mock interview or presentation
practice.upload.dragDrop: Drag and drop a video or audio file here, or click here to select a file
practice.upload.drop: Drop a video or audio file file here
practice.upload.mime.warning: We will not be able to accept this file

user.registration.title: Create your personalized account
user.registration.age.minimum: You must be at least 16 years old to create an account
